CustomField.description: For showing the Dealer's Address on Blind Buyout Breakdown Letter
CustomField.formula: Dealer_Name__r.Business_Address__c & IF(ISBLANK(Dealer_Name__r.Business_Address2__c), '', BR() & Dealer_Name__r.Business_Address2__c) & BR() & Dealer_Name__r.Business_City__c & ' ' & TEXT(Dealer_Name__r.Business_State__c) & ' ' & Dealer_Name__r.Business_Zip__c
CustomField.label: Partner Address
